name: Fant Kids Matching Game
description:
This is a FunFant game, for those who want to improve their matching skills and memory.
Happy music and graphics are included.

Game includes the Fant Kids Eddie and Ellie.
Scenes are selected in the room of the Fants.

The game is controlled with mouse or trackpad.

Scenes included for matching are:
Letters A-Z in a school themed class
Numbers 1-9 in a school themed class
Forms Cube in the form themed room
Forms Triangle in the form themed room
Forms Round in the form themed room
Beach by the sea
Toys in the room
